attributes.action: Make media representation of women's sport equal to men's.
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that male sports presenters and sports receive more air-time and acknowledgement on mainstream TV and are covered more on radio, within newspapers and social media.
attributes.background: To present different types of women's sports on all forms of media

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for broadcasters and not the UK Government or Parliament.
